grieve.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
grieve.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: People need time to grieve after the death of a loved one.
She grieved the loss of her only son.
He died, and every day since then I have grieved for him.
grieve.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if something grieves you, it makes you feel very unhappy
grieve.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: My aunt, it grieves me to say, gets things confused.
